about_the_game:
This music collection features jazz and hip-hop-inspired tracks centered around a horn section (trumpet, saxophone, etc.).

The set includes rhythmic yet slow to mid-tempo tracks, ideal for locations like towns, facilities, and fields. However, feel free to use them creatively in other scenarios such as action, exploration, or event scenes!

These modern tracks offer a distinct vibe compared to traditional fantasy soundtracks, making them particularly suitable for those looking to add something unique to their RPGs.

Composer/Arranger: Takayuki Amanuma

Illustration: Masaya Nagaura

**Included Tracks:**

1. Underworld (Field)

2. Betrayal Street (Field)

3. The Unyielding (Field)

4. Asphalt Canvas (Field)

5. Urban Sketch (Field)

6. Modern Ambience (Exploration)

7. Secret Pact (Exploration)

8. Monochrome (Exploration)

9. Darkness and Smoke (Exploration)

10. Broken Streetlight (Exploration)

11. Black Market (Shop)

12. Negotiation (Shop)

13. Merchant of Death (Shop)

14. Shadow Deal (Shop)

-------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

This music collection features jazz and hip-hop-inspired tracks centered around a horn section (trumpet, saxophone, etc.).

The set includes rhythmic yet slow to mid-tempo tracks, ideal for locations like towns, facilities, and fields. However, feel free to use them creatively in other scenarios such as action, exploration, or event scenes!

These modern tracks offer a distinct vibe compared to traditional fantasy soundtracks, making them particularly suitable for those looking to add something unique to their RPGs.
